2. å¤„ç†jsæ–‡ä»¶ â€‹

5. å¤„ç†å…¶ä»–æ–‡ä»¶ â€‹

  • ä½¿ç”¨file-loaderè¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†ã€‚ï¼ŒoutputPathè®¾å®šè¾“å‡ºç›®å½•

äºŒã€webpack.config.jsæ–‡ä»¶ â€‹

js
const { resolve } = require("path");
//å¤„ç†css
const MiniCssExtractPlugin = require('mini-css-extract-plugin')
//csså‹ç¼©
const OptimizeCssAssetsWebpackPlugin = require('optimize-css-assets-webpack-plugin')
// å¤„ç†html
const HtmlWebpackPlugin = require('html-webpack-plugin')
//å®šä¹‰nodejsç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ï¼Œå†³å®šä½¿ç”¨browserslistçš„å“ªä¸ªç¯å¢ƒ
process.env.NODE_ENV = 'production';
//å¤ç”¨cssloaderå¤„ç†
cosnt commonCssLoader = [
	MiniCssExtractPlugin.loader,
	'css-loader',
	//csså…¼å®¹å¤„ç†
	{
		//è¿˜éœ€è¦åœ¨package.jsonä¸­å®šä¹‰browserslist
		loader:'postcss-loader',
		options:{
			ident:'postcss',
			plugins:() => [
				require('postcss-preset-env')()
			]
		}
	}
]
module.exports = {
  	entry:'./src/js/index.js',
	output:{
		filename:'js/built.js',
		path:resolve(__dirname,'build')
	},
	module:{
		rules:[
			{
				test:/\.css$/,
				use:[...commonCssLoader],
			},
			{
				test:/\.less$/,
				use:[...commonCssLoader,'less-loader'],
			},
			{
				test:/\.js$/,
				exclude:/node_modules/,
				enforce:'pre',
				loader:'eslint-loader',
				options:{
					fix:true
				}
			},
			//jså…¼å®¹å¤„ç†
			{
				test:/\.js$/,
				exclude:/node_modules/,
				loader:'babel-loader',
				options:{
					presets:[
						[
							'@babel/preset-env',
							{
								useBuiltIns:'usage',
								corejs:{version:3},
								targets:{
									chrome:'60',
									firefox:'50'
								}
							}
						]
					]
				}
			},
			//å¤„ç†å›¾ç‰‡
			{
				test:/\.(jpg|png|gif)/,
				loader:'url-loader',
				options:{
					limit:8*1024,
					name:'[hash:10].[ext]',
					outputPath:'imgs',
					exModule:false,
				}
			},
			//å¤„ç†htmlä¸­çš„img
			{
				test:/\.html$/,
				loader:'html-loader',
			},
			//å¤„ç†å…¶ä»–æ–‡ä»¶
			{
				exclude:/\.(js|css|less|html|gif|png|jpg)/,
				loader:'file-loader',
				options:{
					outputPath:'medis',
				}
			}
		]
	},
	plugins:[
		//å¤„ç†css
		new MiniCssExtractPlugin({
			filename:'css/built.css'
		}),
		//å‹ç¼©css
		new OptimizeCssAssetsWebpackPlugin(),
		//å¤„ç†html
		new HtmlWebpackPlugin({
			template:'./src/index.html',
			//å‹ç¼©html
			minify:{
				//å»æ‰ç©ºæ ¼
				collapseWhitespace:true,
				// å»æ‰æ³¨é‡Š
				removeComments:true,
			}
		})
	],
	mode:'production',
}

ä¸‰ã€package.jsonæ–‡ä»¶ â€‹

js
"browserslist": {
    "development": [
      "last 1 chrome version",
      "last 1 firefox version"
    ],
    "production": [
      ">0.2%",
      "not dead",
      "not op_mini all"
    ]
},
"eslintConfig": {"extends": "airbnb-base"}
